alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:55AM MST until March 23 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...The Verde River near Camp Verde. * WHEN...Until noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Verde River. Deadly flooding over low-water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 450 AM MST, river gauges continued to indicated elevated water levels on the Verde River near Camp Verde. Water levels are expected to remain elevated through the morning hours, before falling later this afternoon. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Verde River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Camp Verde and Middle Verde. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event. In hilly or mountainous terrain, there are many low water crossings which will become dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
